summary: This mod includes two versions of the Daedric artifact Ebony Blade, both fully powered up without the requirement of killing friend NPCs. Also included is an unenchanted version of the Ebony Blade.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]Ebony Blade Without Kill Requirements[/b] [/size]

[size=3]This mod comes with three versions of the Daedric artifact Ebony Blade.[/size]

[size=3]1) The first version is identical to a fully charged version in the game without the requirement of having the kill friend NPCs.[/size]
[size=3]2) The second is a true two handed version of the Ebony Blade, again without the requirement of killing friend NPCs.[/size]
[size=3]3) The final type is an unenchanted version of the Ebony Blade. [/size]

[size=4][b]Original [/b][/size]
[size=3]Weight = 10[/size]
[size=3]Damage = 11[/size]
[size=3]Reach = 1.0[/size]
[size=3]Speed = 1.0[/size]
[size=3]Stagger =  0.75[/size]
[size=3]Crit Damage = 0[/size]


[size=4][b]True 2 Handed[/b][/size]
[size=3]Weight = 23[/size]
[size=3]Damage = 24[/size]
[size=3]Reach = 1.3[/size]
[size=3]Speed = 0.7[/size]
[size=3]Stagger = 1.1[/size]
[size=3]Crit Damage = 12[/size]
author: Seyon
